title: Add hang detection logging
description: Log when Ralph detects a hang and when it breaks it. Helps post-mortem analysis of stuck iterations.

acceptanceCriteria.text: SETUP: Log worktree location to execution.log
Log hang detection: `[ISO] HANG DETECTED: No activity for {duration}`
Log hang recovery: `[ISO] HANG BROKEN: Restarting Claude session`
Include story ID and criteria progress in hang logs
Send ntfy notification on hang detection (use existing notifyError)
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
CLEANUP: Commit in worktree: feat: US-117 add hang detection logging
CLEANUP: Push worktree branch to origin
CLEANUP: Return to master branch in main repo before completing
